          <title>
            <string language="es">Triángulos rectángulos en el geoplano</string>
            <string language="en">Right triangles on the geoboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechte Dreiecke auf dem geoboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bonnes triangles sur le geoboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Triângulos direitos no geoboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giusti triangoli sul geoboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σωστά τρίγωνα στο geoboard</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite dibujar, en un geoplano, triángulos, fijando los vértices</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to draw triangles on the geoboard by fixing the vertices</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt,
Dreiecke auf dem geoboard zu zeichnen, indem es die Gipfel regelt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui permet à 
l'utilisateur de tracer des triangles sur le geoboard en fixant les 
sommets</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que permite que o usuário
desenhe triângulos no geoboard reparando os vertices</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente
dissipi i triangoli sul geoboard riparando i vertici</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
επισύρει την προσοχή τα τρίγωνα στο geoboard με τον καθορισμό 
vertices</string>
          </description>
